title: Beautiful Furnished Estate Cottage
posting_body: This is a one of a kind, private garden cottage on a peaceful, quiet, gated estate located in the West Sebastopol Hills.
A great find for a special person that enjoys beauty and tranquility.
Single occupancy due to well and septic restrictions.
Fabulous views and sunsets with refreshing ocean breezes.
Close to walking trails, parks, and beaches.
This upscale cottage has a living room, large bedroom suite, small office, kitchen, bath with shower and tub, and laundry room with w/d.
Amenities include:  55" high def smart TV, fully equipped kitchen including gas stove, dishwasher, refrigerator, espresso machine, microwave, and toaster oven.
All utilities included:  WIFI, electricity, gas, water, garbage, and landscape maintenance.
No smoking or pets, security deposit required.
